channel.title: Grace Hansen, PhD
channel.description: Recent content on Grace Hansen, PhD

item.title: CodeRag
item.description: Notes: This article originally appeared in CodeRag. Code/Rag has always been more than just another online tech blog. We strive to be part of the tech community—serving an essential, fundamental look at what’s going on in the valley. It’s why our tagline is “Know Your Code.” We think a tech news publication should know the basics. Be the source. Get down to brass tacks. We can do that because we’re part of the very ecosystem we’re reporting on.

item.title: Education
item.description: MD/PhD (in progress): University of Chicago Medical Scientist Training Program Pritzker School of Medicine Committee on Genetics, Genomics, and Systems Biology Graduate courses: FAES Graduate School at the National Institutes of Health Bachelor’s of Arts and Sciences: College of William and Mary

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2023 Hansen, G.T., Sobreira, D.R., Weber, Z.T. et al. (2023). Genetics of sexually dimorphic adipose distribution in humans. A functional genomics pipeline identifies pleiotropy and cross-tissue effects within obesity-associated GWAS loci. Nature Communications https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-021-25614-3 Sobreira, D.
